name: The Following
description:
A young charismatic preacher walks the streets of Rønne on the island Bornholm. He is trying to get new members for his local christian cult. But beware of the sinners and the devil. 

(ONLY AVAILABLE FOR WINDOWS at this moment).

Bazooka (2020) - Game design and programming: Nemo Bergmann - Inspired by the book "FADER HVOR?" (PeoplesPress 2020) by Roald Bergmann
